name: E-JECT Swarm Racer: Fur-turistic Hovercraft Action
name_original: E-JECT Swarm Racer: Fur-turistic Hovercraft Action
description:
A game made for the Toronto Game Jam by Derian McCrae, Jamie Tucker, Sagan Yee, and Jason Bond.

Controller recommended. R1 to accelerate, L2 to brake. When you can see a “hijack” indicator on an opponent, press the hijack button (triangle/Y) once to start a jump, and again at the right time (when the red ring reaches the circle in the centre) to land it. If you miss the timing you fall and lose. Also, if a foe hijacks you (should only happen with other players) you will get a chance to get them back by “landing” again. 

(Keyboard alternates: space to accelerate, Z to hijack. )
